about: I am an ambitious technologist with vast knowledge in Cloud Computing and programming. I am fluent in multiple programming languages including Java and Python. I currently hold over a dozen industry certifications including the AWS Solutions Architect Professional. I have worked as both a Cloud Architect and a Senior Software Developer, but I prefer the former. I am an AWS Community Builder since October 2021 with a focus on Serverless. I dedicate countless time to studying so that I remain sharp. I am actively interested in AI, Blockchain, Game Development, ML, Quantum Computing, Robotics, and Kubernetes.

experience.description: Worked closely with our client Gordon Food Services on their ecommerce platform. Primarily worked as a full stack engineer utilizing Angular 15, NgRx, and TypeScript on the frontend as well as Java 17 Spring Boot on the backend. Our application is hosted on Google Cloud Platform leveraging App Engine, Cloud Datastore, Cloud Storage, and Kubernetes Engine. In order to deliver the required performance we use a combination of Elasticsearch and Redis. Our team has created an impressive CI/CD pipeline composed of GitLab CI, Jenkins, and Spinnaker. Since our code deployments are fully automated we rely heavily on various testing methods including end-to-end, integration, performance, and unit.
experience.title: Senior Software Developer Consultant

experience.description: Worked as a leader for our on-premises to AWS migration. Created architectural diagrams to share the cloud state we were working towards as well as explained AWS decisions and services to the team. Used Ansible, CloudFormation, and Jenkins to create cloud infrastructure. Used bash, the AWS CLI, and Jenkins to automate repetitive tasks. Optimized, secured, and maintained AWS environments throughout the migration process. Finally, performed cost optimization on AWS environments constantly. Helped monitor and report cloud costs to organization leaders on a regular cadence.
experience.title: Cloud Architect

experience.description: Worked on a large team to generate a 5G coverage map and support our internal network applications. Designed and implemented backend logic including API specifications and database elements. Used Java 8 Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and MySQL databases with GIS plug-ins for spatial operators. Additionally used Python for automation and quick ad-hoc work. Served as a gate keeper to our code repositories and as a mentor to our junior team members. Handled on call, code upgrades, and escalations.
experience.title: Full Stack Engineer

experience.description: Worked on a small team to support 5G customer qualification problem that would reduce technician visits for homes that are unavailable to get 5G signal. Personally designed and implemented backend logic for the product that was integrated by the dotcom team that controlled verizon.com. Used Java 8 Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and MySQL databases with GIS plug-ins for spatial operators. Coordinated API communication across numerous teams in order to deliver the product.
experience.title: Java Software Engineer

experience.description: Quickly came up to speed on existing code, databases, and technology used. Started migrating massive code repositories from Java 7 to Java 8 where applicable and close gaps in jUnit coverage. Worked on a small team responsible for remotely configuring radio tower equipment to eliminate technician trips and reduce turn around for radio tower equipment configuration. Used Java 8 Spring Boot, MySQL, and Oracle.
experience.title: Java Developer Contractor

groups.description: The AWS Community Builders program offers technical resources, education, and networking opportunities to AWS technical enthusiasts and emerging thought leaders who are passionate about sharing knowledge and connecting with the technical community.
groups.name: AWS Community Builder

groups.description: AWS customers share their thoughts about our products and features as members of our customer council. Weâ€™re curious and want to learn from you!
groups.name: AWS Customer Council Member

groups.description: With the rapid adoption of AWS among developers, startups, and enterprises, communities have organically organized over 400 AWS-focused user groups around the world. User groups are peer-to-peer communities which meet regularly to share ideas, answer questions, and learn about new services and best practices.
groups.name: AWS User Group Leader

groups.description: Virtual Coffee is a tech community where friendships are formed and support is given to people at all stages of their journey. Join our laid-back twice-weekly conversations and our online events to connect with people who share your passion for technology.
groups.name: Virtual Coffee Member

name: Justin Wheeler
